#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int n;
        cin>>n;
        int w[n],t[n];
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            cin>>w[i];
        }
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            cin>>t[i];
            w[i] = 3*w[i] + t[i];
        }
        sort(w,w+n);
        reverse(w,w+n);
        cout<<w[0]<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
